channel.title: Making money on my RSPS?
channel.description:
I have a good server/client running now and it has a fair amount of players, but recently some have been complaining about making money. I have a Bandos Boss wich drops 100m and Thieving of course, but they are not satisfied. Any good ideas?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Making money on my RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

Maybe moneys not the answer…
Pk points?
With pk shop.
CW points?
With cw shop.
SOME TYPE OF FREGGIN POINT SYSTEM
AND A FREGGIN POINT SHOP!

Or if you want money just make a minigame that if u compleye u get 500m idk

place3: same thing only more monsters like 2 or 3
